## JsonConverter class

An @<!-- -->fgv/ts-utils `Converter` from `unknown` to type-safe JSON, optionally rendering any string property names or values using mustache with a supplied view.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class JsonConverter extends JsonEditorConverter 
```
**Extends:** [JsonEditorConverter](./ts-json.jsoneditorconverter.md)
